capabilities.capability: Render image based on topic, mood, tone, keywords, or description
capabilities.definition: Create visual content from textual descriptions, including mood, tone, and keyword-based generation

capabilities.capability: Render persona image based on description
capabilities.definition: Create character or persona visualizations from detailed descriptions

capabilities.capability: Render image that communicates tone or mood based on image
capabilities.definition: Create images that convey specific emotional tones or moods from reference images

capabilities.capability: Write description based on image
capabilities.action: Generate story, dialog, description, or questions
capabilities.definition: Create detailed textual descriptions from visual content analysis

capabilities.capability: Write story based on topic or description
capabilities.action: Generate story, dialog, description, or questions
capabilities.definition: Create narrative content from topics, themes, or descriptive prompts

capabilities.capability: Write description based on keywords
capabilities.action: Generate story, dialog, description, or questions
capabilities.definition: Generate descriptive content from keyword inputs

capabilities.capability: Write character's response based on dialog
capabilities.action: Generate story, dialog, description, or questions
capabilities.definition: Create contextual character responses within ongoing conversations

capabilities.capability: Write code based on task description
capabilities.definition: Generate functional code from natural language task descriptions

capabilities.capability: Transcribe into text from speech
capabilities.definition: Convert spoken audio content into written text format

capabilities.capability: Translate into description from code
capabilities.definition: Convert programming code into human-readable descriptions

capabilities.capability: Vocalize into speech based on transcript
capabilities.definition: Convert written text into spoken audio output

capabilities.capability: Answer product-question based on product description
capabilities.definition: Provide answers to product-related questions using product information

capabilities.capability: Answer question based on earlier mentions
capabilities.definition: Respond to questions using context from previous conversation or content

capabilities.capability: Answer how-to based on question about programming or science
capabilities.definition: Provide instructional answers for technical and scientific questions

capabilities.capability: Rank program function based on point in computer code
capabilities.action: Understand; rank actions, elements, and qualities
capabilities.definition: Evaluate and rank programming functions within code context

capabilities.capability: Rank personas based on description
capabilities.action: Understand; rank actions, elements, and qualities
capabilities.definition: Evaluate and rank character personas based on descriptive criteria

capabilities.capability: Rank color scheme based on description
capabilities.action: Understand; rank actions, elements, and qualities
capabilities.definition: Evaluate and rank color combinations based on design descriptions

capabilities.capability: Rank keyword suggestions based on a point in prompt
capabilities.action: Understand; rank actions, elements, and qualities
capabilities.definition: Evaluate and rank keyword options based on prompt context

capabilities.capability: Find similar keywords or document based on dialog, documents, or description
capabilities.definition: Identify related keywords or documents based on content similarity

capabilities.capability: Find similar element in image based on group of images
capabilities.definition: Identify similar visual elements across multiple images

capabilities.capability: Identify inappropriate/offensive response based on dialog
capabilities.definition: Detect and flag inappropriate or offensive content in conversations

capabilities.capability: Identify if person is in image from images
capabilities.definition: Detect human presence in visual content

capabilities.capability: Identify sections/elements (problems, methods) based on research paper or dialog
capabilities.definition: Extract and categorize specific sections from academic or conversational content

capabilities.capability: Identify argument from document, image, or dialog
capabilities.definition: Extract and identify argumentative content from various media types

capabilities.capability: Identify sentiment from document, image, or dialog
capabilities.definition: Analyze emotional tone and sentiment across different content types

capabilities.capability: Interpret explanation based on professional terms
capabilities.definition: Translate professional terminology into accessible explanations

capabilities.capability: Interpret a question to ask someone based on dialog or story
capabilities.definition: Generate relevant questions based on conversation or narrative context

capabilities.capability: Interpret reason based on a professional knowledge
capabilities.definition: Provide reasoning explanations using domain-specific knowledge

capabilities.capability: Summarize into keywords/bullets based on document, dialog, or diary
capabilities.definition: Extract key points and create bullet-point summaries from various content types

capabilities.capability: Summarize into few sentences based on documents, stories, or dialog
capabilities.definition: Create concise sentence-based summaries from longer content

capabilities.capability: Refine document's tone of voice based on document and tone
capabilities.definition: Adjust and improve the tone and style of written content

capabilities.capability: Refine grammar within text
capabilities.definition: Correct and improve grammatical structure in written content

capabilities.capability: Refine into more explicit/effective prompt based on vague prompt
capabilities.definition: Transform unclear prompts into more specific and effective instructions

patterns.description: Enable users to ask questions one at a time and provide step-by-step support to guide them through solving problems
patterns.use_case: Learning complex topics, problem-solving assistance, replacing human agents for non-critical tasks

patterns.description: Provide synthesized data and structured frameworks to help users learn and discover relevant criteria for decision-making
patterns.use_case: Decision-making support, criteria identification, data exploration

patterns.description: Facilitate communication by allowing users to express intentions through examples like moodboards
patterns.use_case: Design inspiration, style transfer, creative direction, preference expression

patterns.description: Generate variety of examples to help users explore and recognize what aligns with their preferences
patterns.use_case: Product selection, design choices, preference discovery, exploratory search

patterns.description: Guide users in refining ideas iteratively and in real-time to identify specific desires
patterns.use_case: Content creation, design iteration, idea development, real-time collaboration

patterns.description: Complete tasks with updated drafts when users have partial work but struggle to finish
patterns.use_case: Document completion, content finishing, draft enhancement, task assistance

patterns.description: Provide drafts, intermediate results, or initial methods to help users overcome blank page syndrome
patterns.use_case: Content creation, project initiation, overcoming writer's block, getting started

patterns.description: Break down complex problems into step-by-step reasoning to improve accuracy
patterns.use_case: Mathematical problems, logical reasoning, complex decision making

patterns.description: Provide examples in the prompt to guide the model's behavior and improve performance
patterns.use_case: Task-specific formatting, style transfer, specialized responses

patterns.description: Combine external knowledge retrieval with text generation for accurate, up-to-date responses
patterns.use_case: Question answering, document analysis, real-time information

patterns.description: Enable LLMs to call external functions and APIs to perform actions
patterns.use_case: Database queries, API integrations, tool usage

patterns.description: Design effective prompts to get desired outputs from language models
patterns.use_case: Content generation, task specification, output formatting

patterns.description: Train models on specific datasets to improve performance on particular tasks
patterns.use_case: Domain-specific applications, specialized knowledge, custom behaviors

patterns.description: Coordinate multiple AI agents to solve complex problems collaboratively
patterns.use_case: Complex workflows, specialized expertise, distributed problem solving

patterns.description: Implement safety constraints and ethical guidelines in AI systems
patterns.use_case: Content moderation, ethical AI, responsible deployment

patterns.description: Maintain long-term memory and context across conversations and sessions
patterns.use_case: Personal assistants, ongoing projects, user preference learning

patterns.description: Enable LLMs to use external tools and resources to extend their capabilities
patterns.use_case: Web search, calculations, file operations, external APIs

patterns.description: Generate multiple responses and select the most consistent or common answer
patterns.use_case: Factual accuracy, confidence estimation, error reduction

patterns.description: Explore multiple reasoning paths simultaneously to find optimal solutions
patterns.use_case: Complex problem solving, game playing, strategic planning

patterns.description: Combine reasoning and action-taking to solve problems iteratively
patterns.use_case: Multi-step problem solving, interactive tasks, dynamic environments

patterns.description: Apply constraints to ensure outputs meet specific requirements or formats
patterns.use_case: Structured outputs, compliance, format requirements

patterns.description: Combine multiple models or approaches to improve overall performance
patterns.use_case: Accuracy improvement, robustness, specialized expertise
